record.description: Grant Atkinson, clad in pajamas, attempts a flying leap in an effort to escape what appears to be a delicate situation in "Good-By Again," the play [about] a young author who accidentally catches up with his past. Ruth Ahlquist is the author’s secretary who tries to dissuade the desperate young man. At the right, Ruth Wehlan, as the "past" and Dick Himmel in the role of the un-jealous husband, shout warnings. "Good-By Again" will be presented Friday and Saturday by the University of Chicago Dramatic Association.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
